member_organisations: Als organisatie staan wij in geregeld contact met 400 à 500 journalisten en verder nog met een hele reeks vertegenwoordigers van academisch wereld, cultuurinstellingen, mediabedrijven en verenigingen. In totaal hebben wij +/-1000 correspondentieadressen in onze mailinglijsten.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Culture, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: Fake news consultatie.  Verder geen waarbij wij enige beïnvloeding zoeken.
organisation_name: Vereniging van Europese Journalisten-Belgische sectie (AEJ Belgium)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Organizing conferences, congresses, workshops and all kind of activities that help branding the job of EU correspondent and empower fellow-journalists, EU Correspondents doing their job in the evolving media landscape. Historically we pursue as well to deepen the knowledge of European institutions and their functioning among our colleagues and the interested public.
